snippet: North Carolina State University said Friday that it was temporarily banning alcohol at social events for most fraternities after two chapters were suspended, one of them amid drug and sexual assault allegations.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina State University said Friday that it was temporarily banning alcohol at social events for most fraternities after two chapters were suspended, one of them amid drug and sexual assault allegations.

headline.main: North Carolina: Alcohol Banned at Fraternity Events
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Alcohol Banned at Fraternity Events
